## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and user-specific files
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.cache
*.pdb
*.log

# Build Folders
bin/
obj/
out/

# EF Core Migrations (optional, if you want to ignore auto-generated migrations)
# Migrations/
# *.Designer.cs

# ASP.NET Core files
appsettings*.json.user
appsettings.Development.json
wwwroot/lib/

# Rider
.idea/

# Node.js/npm
node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log

# OS Files
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store
